result.eng: Mind the gap between the door and the plaform.
result.ga: Seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardán
result.orig: Seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardán
result.html: Seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardánMind the gap between the door and the plaform.
result.ponchtml: Seaċain an ḃearna idir an doras agus an t-ardánMind the gap between the door and the plaform.

result.eng: Do you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.
result.ga: An miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - Ní miste
result.orig: An miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - Ní miste
result.html: An miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - Ní misteDo you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.
result.ponchtml: An miste leat má osclaím an ḟuinneog - Ní misteDo you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.

result.eng: Would you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ga: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.orig: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.html: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadhWould you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a ḃogaḋWould you mind helping me to move this table?

result.eng: Would you mind? - No I wouldn't.
result.html: Ar mhiste leat - Níor mhisteWould you mind? - No I wouldn't.
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat - Níor ṁisteWould you mind? - No I wouldn't.

result.eng: What do you have in mind?
result.html: Cad atá ar aigne agatWhat do you have in mind?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá ar aigne agatWhat do you have in mind?

result.eng: He meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ga: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.orig: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.html: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maithHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ponchtml: Ní sláinte an ċoirp aṁáin a ḃí i gceist aige aċ sláinte na haigne ċoṁ maiṫHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.

result.eng: I wouldn't mind winning the lottery.
result.ga: Níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachan
result.orig: Níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachan
result.html: Níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachanI wouldn't mind winning the lottery.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṁiste liom an crannċur a ḃuaċanI wouldn't mind winning the lottery.

result.eng: Would you mind waiting a minute?
result.html: Ar mhiste leat fanacht nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat fanaċt nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?

result.eng: Those strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ga: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.orig: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.html: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ponchtml: Glanaḋ na ceisteanna aisteaċa seo amaċ as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.

result.html: Chaill sé a mheabhair glanHe lost his mind completely.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill sé a ṁeaḃair glanHe lost his mind completely.
